name: devinit-vsc
description: Quickly initialise files and folders with preconfigured boilerplate templates

commands.title: Devinit: Render file template into current file

devinit.environment.executablePath.markdownDescription: Specifies the path to the `devinit` executable; leave empty to read from PATH.

devinit.environment.configurationFile.markdownDescription:
Specifies the path to the configuration file (i.e. the `devinitrc.yml` file by default); leave empty to use system default locations. These locations include:
- `$HOME/.devinit/devinitrc.yml`
- `$HOME/.config/devinit/devinitrc.yml`.

devinit.automation.templateAssociations.markdownDescription:
Provides a map of templates associated with files, matched by [glob patterns](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/glob-patterns). When a file is created that matches one of these patterns, the associated template is rendered into it.

File patterns are expected in the 'Item' column; template names are expected in the 'Value' column.

E.g. `*.h`: `headerTemplate`
